{{Actor| | type = Gibs | name = Small stalker meat chunk | class = SerpentGib3 | game = Hexen }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:SerpentGib1|SerpentGib1]]→SerpentGib3
A small meat chunk from a {{Class|Serpent|stalker}} or a {{Class|SerpentLeader|stalker leader}}. It is spawned when gibbed. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR SerpentGib3 : [[Classes:SerpentGib1|SerpentGib1]] { States { Spawn: SSXD T 6 SSXD T 6 [[A_FloatGib]] SSXD TT 8 [[A_FloatGib]] SSXD TT 12 [[A_FloatGib]] SSXD T 232 [[A_DelayGib]] SSXD TT 12 [[A_SinkGib]] SSXD TTT 8 [[A_SinkGib]] Stop } }
